GameObject
Class MovableObject

java.lang.Object
  GameObject.GameObject
      GameObject.MovableObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public class MovableObject
extends GameObject

Defines the commmon functionality shared by all the objects that can move on the grid.

move

public void move()
Displaces the object on the grid in the specified motion. The size of the displacement depends on the speed.
